title: Part A
stimulusHtml: 1 point: government can impose a per-unit tax on pollution, sell pollution permits, restrict quantity, or require emissions reduction equipment

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point: MC increases, since the tax increases the cost per unit of output

1 point: output will decrease

1 point: explanation that MC has shifted up and the firm will select new output level where the new MC equals P

1 point: price will increase

1 point: explanation that the supply curve will shift up by the amount of the tax, causing the price to rise
